subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks are 5-10 this season in games that have a “clutch” moment; the flaws that hinder them throughout the game are brought into stark relief by the pressure of the final minutes.
snippet: The Knicks are 5-10 this season in games that have a “clutch” moment; the flaws that hinder them throughout the game are brought into stark relief by the pressure of the final minutes.
